function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal impacts of Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased social harm and exacerbation of social inequality","Mitigation":"Addressing social determinants of health, implementing equitable healthcare policies","Technologies":"Healthcare data analytics, remote telemedicine, public health interventions","People":"Vulnerable populations, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed academic publishing and research output","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying significant research and overlooking important contributions","Mitigation":"Improving refereeing and publication processes, prioritizing robust research","Technologies":"Research data analytics, publication management software","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Research institutions, academic publishers"},{"Description":"Deleterious consequences of lockdown measures for health","Impact":"Negative impact on public health due to lockdowns","Mitigation":"Balancing health and economic considerations in lockdown decisions, providing support for affected populations","Technologies":"Healthcare data analytics, remote healthcare provision, economic stimulus modeling","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
